00090 template <class T>
00091 int d3l_fop_write(const char *sz_file, T* buff, const unsigned int size)
00092 {
00093     if(access(sz_file, F_OK) == 0)
00094     {
00095         std::string str_err;
00096         if(0 == unlink(sz_file))
00097         {
00098             str_err = "Note d3l::d3l_fop_write(const char *sz_file, T* buff, const unsigned int size) File ";
00099             str_err = str_err + sz_file + " has been delete!";
00100         }
00101         else
00102         {
00103             str_err = "ERROR d3l::d3l_fop_write(const char *sz_file, T* buff, const unsigned int size) File ";
00104             str_err = str_err + sz_file + " can't been delete!";
00105         }
00106         d3l_sys_err(str_err.c_str());
00107     }
00108 
00109     int fout = open(sz_file, O_WRONLY|O_CREAT, 0777);
00110     ssize_t rs = write(fout, buff, size * sizeof(T));
00111     close(fout);
00112     return rs;
00113 }
00114 
00116 
00122 template <class T>
00123 int d3l_fop_read(const char *sz_file, T *&buff)
00124 {
00125     if(access(sz_file, F_OK) != 0)
00126     {
00127         std::string str_err = "ERROR d3l::d3l_fop_read(const char *sz_file, T* buff) File ";
00128         str_err = str_err + sz_file + " can't be found!";
00129         d3l_sys_err(str_err.c_str());
00130         return -1;
00131     }
00132 
00133     ssize_t file_size = d3l_fop_size(sz_file);
00134     int fin = open(sz_file, O_RDONLY, 0777);
00135     ssize_t sum = 0;
00136     ssize_t len = 0;
00137     T *buff_tmp = NULL;
00138     d3l_mem_create(buff, file_size/sizeof(T), static_cast<T>(0));
00139     d3l_mem_create(buff_tmp, 1024, static_cast<T>(0));
00140 
00141     while((len = read(fin, buff_tmp, 1024)) > 0)
00142     {
00143         memcpy(buff + sum/sizeof(T), buff_tmp, len);
00144         sum += len;
00145     }
00146 
00147     d3l_mem_free(buff_tmp);
00148     close(fin);
00149 
00150     return sum;
00151 }

00253 template <class T>
00254 T* d3l_mem_create(T *&p_ptr, const unsigned int &size, T value = 0)
00255 {
00256     p_ptr = new T[size];
00257     if(NULL == p_ptr)
00258     {
00259         std::string err_str = "ERROR d3l::T *d3l_mem_create(const unsigned int, const int = 0) ";
00260         d3l_sys_err(err_str.c_str());
00261     }
00262     else
00263         memset(p_ptr, value, size * sizeof(T));
00264     return p_ptr;
00265 }
00266 
00268 
00273 template <class T>
00274 T* d3l_mem_free(T *&p_ptr)
00275 {
00276     if(NULL != p_ptr)
00277     {
00278         delete[] p_ptr;
00279         p_ptr = NULL;
00280     }
00281     return p_ptr;
00282 }
